place.name: CALDECOTE
place.gazetteerText: CALDECOTT, a parish in Hitchin district, Herts; on the verge of the county, near Icknield-street 3¼ miles N by W of Baldock r. station. Post Town, Newnham, under Baldock. Acres, 318. Real property, £484. Pop., 44. Houses, 11. The property is all in one estate. Roman urns have been found. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Rochester. Value, £75. Patron,C. Hale, Esq. The church was reported in 1859 to need repair. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
